Ability.Name: Tracer Lock

Description.OldValue: Tracer Missile grants Tracer Lock, increasing the damage dealt by the next Rail Shot by 6% or reducing the activation time of the next Rapid Scan by 20%. Stacks up to 5 times.

Ability.Description: Tracer Missile grants Tracer Lock, increasing the damage dealt by the next Rail Shot by 6% or reducing the activation time of the next Healing Scan by 20%. Stacks up to 5 times.

Ability.Name: Custom Walkhar Auspice
Ability.Description: This custom Walkhar Auspice has smaller intake dampeners and custom programming which allow for large bursts of speed in short intervals while also increasing movement speed and offering excellent knock-off protection.

Ability.Name: Advanced Anodyne Medpac
Ability.Description: Restores <<1>> health and an additional <<2>> health over <<3[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds. Only usable once per fight. (Cooldown: 1.5 minutes)

Ability.Name: Anodyne Medpac
Ability.Description: Restores <<1>> health and an additional <<2>> health over <<3[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds. Only usable once per fight. (Cooldown: 1.5 minutes)

Ability.Name: Advanced Anodyne Med Unit
Ability.Description: Restores <<1>> health to you and your companion. Only usable once per fight. (Cooldown: 1.5 minutes)

Ability.Name: Anodyne Med Unit
Ability.Description: Restores <<1>> health to you and your companion. Only usable once per fight. (Cooldown: 1.5 minutes)

Description.OldValue: Activating Ravage or Master Strike will grant Weaponmaster's/Challenger's Critical Bonus making your next Vicious Throw, Furious Strike and Annihilate or Dispatch, Concentrated Slice and Merciless Slash critically hit. This effect can't occur more than once every minute.

Ability.Description: Activating Ravage, Master Strike, Dual Saber Throw, or Twin Saber Throw will grant Weaponmaster's/Challenger's Critical Bonus making your next Vicious Throw, Furious Strike and Annihilate or Dispatch, Concentrated Slice and Merciless Slash critically hit. This effect can't occur more than once every minute.

Description.OldValue: Increases the duration of Supercharged Gas and Supercharge Cells by 3 seconds.

Ability.Description: Increases the duration of Supercharged Gas and Supercharged Cell by 3 seconds.

Ability.Name: Forcequake

Description.OldValue: Channels the Force into the ground at the target location, causing it to quake and tremble, consuming 60 Force and dealing <<1>> energy damage to up to 8 targets within 8 meters over the duration of the channel. Standard and weak targets have a 33% chance to be stunned by the storm each second.

Ability.Description: Channels the Force into the ground at the target location, causing it to quake and tremble, consuming 60 Force and dealing <<1>> energy damage to up to 8 targets within 8 meters over the duration of the channel. Standard and weak targets have a 33% chance to be stunned by the quake each second.

Ability.Name: Cascading Debris

Description.OldValue:
Deals <<1>> kinetic damage to the target and consumes 40 Force over the duration of the channel. Slows the movement speed of the target by 50% and stuns weak or standard enemies while channeled.
Shares a cooldown with Telekinetic Throw.

Ability.Description:
Deals <<1>> kinetic damage to the target and consumes 40 Force over the duration of the channel. Slows the movement speed of the target by 50% and stuns weak or standard enemies while channeled. This ability can be channeled while moving.
Shares a cooldown with Telekinetic Throw.

Ability.Name: Felling Blow
Ability.Description: Force Leap and Zealous Leap make your next Force Sweep or Focused Burst used within <<1>> seconds an automatic critical hit.

Ability.Name: Zealous Leap
Ability.Description: Leaps to a target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage and immobilizing the target for 1 second. Strikes with both weapons if dual wielding.

Ability.Name: Inspiring Force
Ability.Description: Freezing Force increases the movement speed of all allies within 8 meters, excluding yourself, by 50% for <<1>> seconds.

Ability.Name: Unremitting

Description.OldValue: Force Leap grants Unremitting, granting immunity to movement-impairing effects and effects that push and pull you around for <<1>> seconds.

Ability.Description: Force Leap grants Unremitting, granting immunity to movement-impairing effects and effects that push or pull you around for <<1>> seconds.

Ability.Name: Force Melt
Ability.Description: Calls on the power of the Force to melt the target, causing it to burn for <<1>> elemental damage over <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>.

Ability.Name: Merciless Zeal

Description.OldValue: Your Cauterize, Overload Saber, adn Force Melt burns heal you for 15% of the damage they deal.

Ability.Description: Your Cauterize, Overload Saber, and Force Melt burns heal you for 15% of the damage they deal.

Ability.Name: Overload Saber
Ability.Description: Charges your lightsabers with deadly energy for 15 seconds, causing your next 3 successful melee attacks to make the target burn for <<1>> elemental damage over 6 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times. Requires Juyo Form.

Ability.Name: Plasma Blades

Description.OldValue: Your burn effects have a 20% chance to build 1 focus when dealing damage. This effect cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.

Ability.Description: Your burn effects have a 20% chance to build 1 focus when dealing damage. This effect cannot occur more than once every second.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack

Description.OldValue: Right-click to open this Deep Core Platinum Pack. This pack contains 1 Extra Rare or better Bonus Item from the Deep Core Explorer's Packs.

Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Deep Core Platinum Pack. This pack contains 1 Super Rare or better Bonus Item from the Deep Core Explorer's Packs.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack

Description.OldValue: Right-click to open this Grand Nightlife Pack. This pack contains 4 items: 1 super-rare bonus item, 1 rare or better bonus item, 1 Fortuitous Dye Kit, and 1 Major or Minor XP Boost.

Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Grand Nightlife Pack. This pack contains 4 items: 1 Super Rare or better bonus item, 1 Rare or better bonus item, 1 Fortuitous Dye Kit, and 1 Major or Minor XP Boost. This pack contains boxes of complete Armor sets, Mounts, Weapons, Color Crystals and Toys from the Nightlife Shipment.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack

Description.OldValue: Right-click to open this Grand KOTOR Pack. This pack contains 1 random complete armor set.

Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Galactic Legends Pack. This pack contains 1 random complete armor set, plus a chance to obtain an additional armor set.

Ability.Name: Throw the Custom Huttball

Description.OldValue: Throws the Custom Huttball to an ally. Must be carrying the ball to throw it.

Ability.Description: Throws the Custom Huttball to an ally. Must be carrying the ball to throw it. Use the Throw the Custom Huttball ability to throw the Custom Huttball to a friend before the Custom Huttball explodes. There are three stages to help determine when the Custom Huttball will explode; Safe, Caution and Danger, each with a random duration.

Ability.Name: Baron Deathmark's Swashbuckling Cutter
Ability.Description:
Activates Baron Deathmark's Swashbuckling Cutter. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill. Reduces incoming damage by 15% while mounted.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Ridge Hunter Rancor

Description.OldValue:
Summons the Felucian Rancor creature mount. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Description:
Summons the Ridge Hunter Rancor creature mount. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Rark K-133T

Description.OldValue:
Activates the Rark K-13E7, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Description:
Activates the Rark K-133T, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Vondell Ruby

Description.OldValue:
Activates the Vondell Ruby, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Description:
Activates the Vondell Ruby, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill. Use the Mount Flourish Key binding to activate this mount's flourish.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Meirm Gray Fox
Ability.Description:
Activates the Meirm Gray Fox, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Depredating Volts

Description.OldValue:
Deals <<1>> energy damage to the target and consumes 40 Force over the duration of the channel. Slows the movement speed of the target by 50% and stuns weak or standard enemies while channeled.
Shares a cooldown with Force Lightning.

Ability.Description:
Deals <<1>> energy damage to the target and consumes 40 Force over the duration of the channel. Slows the movement speed of the target by 50% and stuns weak or standard enemies while channeled. This ability can be channeled while moving.
Shares a cooldown with Force Lightning.

Ability.Name: Hemorrhage

Description.OldValue: Your bleed effects have a 20% chance to build 1 rage when dealing damage. This effect cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.

Ability.Description: Your bleed effects have a 20% chance to build 1 rage when dealing damage. This effect cannot occur more than once every second.

Ability.Name: Hungering

Description.OldValue: Your Rupture, Deadly Saber, adn Force Rend bleeds heal you for 15% of the damage they deal.

Ability.Description: Your Rupture, Deadly Saber, and Force Rend bleeds heal you for 15% of the damage they deal.

Ability.Name: Unstoppable

Description.OldValue: Force Charge grants Unstoppable, granting immunity to movement-impairing effects and effects that push and pull you around for <<1>> seconds.

Ability.Description: Force Charge grants Unstoppable, granting immunity to movement-impairing effects and effects that push or pull you around for <<1>> seconds.

Ability.Name: Charged Barrel

Description.OldValue: Grav Round grants Charged Barrel, increasing the damage dealt by the next High Impact Bolt by 6% and reducing the activation time of the next Medical Probe by 20%. Stacks up to 5 times.

Ability.Description: Grav Round grants Charged Barrel, increasing the damage dealt by the next High Impact Bolt by 6% and reducing the activation time of the next Advanced Medical Probe by 20%. Stacks up to 5 times.

Ability.Name: Custom Walkhar Auspice
Ability.Description: This custom Walkhar Auspice has smaller intake dampeners and custom programming which allow for large bursts of speed in short intervals while also increasing movement speed and offering excellent knock-off protection.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack
Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Mid Rim Platinum Pack. This pack contains 1 select Super Rare or better Bonus Item from the Mid Rim Explorer's Packs.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack
Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Grand Crystal Pack. Contains one Color Crystal, drawn randomly from the Starfighter, Stronghold, and Shadow Packs found on the Cartel Market.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack
Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Grand Dye Module Kit. Contains one Dye Module, drawn randomly from the Starfighter, Stronghold, and Shadow Packs found on the Cartel Market.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack
Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Grand Emotes Pack. Contains one Emote, drawn randomly from the Starfighter, Stronghold, and Shadow Packs found on the Cartel Market.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack
Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Grand Mounts Pack. Contains one Mount, drawn randomly from the Starfighter, Stronghold, and Shadow Packs found on the Cartel Market.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack
Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Grand Pets Pack. Contains one Pet, drawn randomly from the Starfighter, Stronghold, and Shadow Packs found on the Cartel Market.

Ability.Name: Repairing
Ability.Description: Instantly uses the placeable and triggers the "On Use" hook.

Ability.Name: Defensive Forms
Ability.Description: Builds <<4[%d/%d/%d]>> Centering when attacked. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds. Additionally improves the effect of your lightsaber forms while they are active: Shii-Cho Form: Further increases damage reduction by <<2[%d/%d/%d]>>%. Juyo Form: Reduces internal and elemental damage taken by <<3[%d/%d/%d]>>%. Ataru Form: Increases your movement speed by <<1[%d/%d/%d]>>%.

Ability.Name: Guard and Thrust
Ability.Description: Reduces the cooldown of Riposte by <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>> while Saber Ward is active.

Ability.Name: Momentum
Ability.Description: Force Leap and Zealous Leap have a <<1>>% chance to make the next Blade Storm activate without a focus cost.

Ability.Name: Victory Rush
Ability.Description: Sundering Strike builds <<1>> additional focus.

Ability.Name: Force Guard
Ability.Description: Reduces damage taken from Force attacks by <<1>>%. In addition, whenever you reflect Force damage with Saber Reflect, you build <<2>> focus.

Ability.Name: Intervention
Ability.Description: Force Leap, Zealous Leap, and Guardian Leap have a <<1>>% chance to grant Intervention, which makes your next Freezing Force cost no focus and activate with a 0.5 second global cooldown.

Ability.Name: Second Wind
Ability.Description: Resolute has a <<1>>% chance to heal you for 10% of your maximum health.

Ability.Name: Sokan
Ability.Description: Combat Focus has a <<1>>% chance to grant Sokan, granting immunity to all movement-slowing effects for the duration.

Ability.Name: Force Leap
Ability.Description: Jumps to a distant target, dealing <<1>> damage with the main-hand weapon, immoblizing the target for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>> and interrupting the target's current action. Builds 3 focus. Cannot be used against targets in cover.
